title: Comcast Reports Earnings Tomorrow. Here’s What to Expect.
text:
Comcast is set to report its third-quarter earnings on Thursday before the market opens. Investors will be focused on the growth of Comcast’s Xfinity broadband internet business, which has formed a key part of many bullish analysts’ theses on the company. They will also be listening for new details about the forthcoming ad-supported streaming service from Comcast’s NBCUniversal unit and the performance of the newly integrated Sky acquisition.
